document_data.name: Lawflame
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lawflame''''' was the [[sword]] of state for the dukes that ruled over [[Daggerford]].
document_data.Description: It was a ''+1 [[flame tongue]] [[bastard sword]]'' that possessed sentient intelligence and a unique personality.
document_data.Powers: ''Lawflame'' granted its wielder several different powers. Once per day they could [[detect evil|become aware of evil beings]], [[detect magic|sense magical energies]], and [[Clairaudience/clairvoyance|gain sight of a location a significant distance away]].
document_data.History: The sword was originally given to the first duke of Daggerford [[Tyndal]], by [[Elorfindar Floshin]].
